item.title: Hailee Steinfeld - Back to Life - Key of G
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Back To Life on the ukulele by Hailee Steinfeld. The chords used are G A Bm Em F#m. (half step down from original key)
*Note - if you are adding keys/piano I would have them play a Gmaj7 instead of the G.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Hailee Steinfeld - Most Girls - Key of G
item.description:
* I took out one line that had some profanity
This tutorial will show you how to play Most Girls by Hailee Steinfeld on the ukulele. The chords used are G C D Em. (original is in A)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
